content:
# The attempt to harvest iron ore has failed again, indicating that I am still not in a position to reach the resource.
# This could be due to the specific coordinates of the bounding box center not being accessible for harvesting.
# 
# Let's try moving to the left-top corner of the bounding box instead, as it may provide a better position for harvesting.

# Calculate the left-top corner of the iron ore patch's bounding box.
left_top_position = iron_ore_patch.bounding_box.left_top
move_to(left_top_position)  # Moving to the left-top corner of the iron ore patch.
